mapper.select:
SELECT bepi.*,ei.pno as dwdm,ei.name as dwmc,pi.pno as gwdm, pi.name as gwmc FROM bg_enterprise_place_info bepi INNER JOIN bg_activity_enterprise bae ON bepi.activity_enterprise_id = bae.id INNER JOIN enterprise_info ei ON bae.enterprise_id = ei.id INNER JOIN place_info pi ON bepi.place_id = pi.id where 1=1
and bepi.id = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from bg_enterprise_place_info where place_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
mapper.update:
